summary: This is MOD to add various types of companions.
descriptionHtml:
This is MOD to add various types of companions.

They have a separate Body and texture.
Of course, is the work of the Modder Body and texture excellent.

Skyrim Version 1.8 or higher required!!


[youtube]jgsHmqJaINs[/youtube]
movie by hodilton

===Update==
v1.1
add Downward revision skills patch.
fixed a espfile that had a serious problem.

v1.2
add two followers.
fixed v1.2 Optional Files

v1.3
add three followers.
Abolish the weakened version.

v1.4
add two followers.
fix to problem that NPC race had become playable.

===Introduction of companion===

Beatrix?
?BodyType:CHSBHC
 Skill & Perk:One Handed(Sword),Block ,HeavyArmor
 Inventory:EbonyArmor set
 Location:Solitude Blue Palace

Melissa
 BodyType:CHSBHC
 Skill & Perk:Conjuration(Necromancy)
 Inventory:Nightingale set
 Location:Winterhold Arch-Mage\'s Quarters

Veronica
 BodyType:UNPB
 Skill & Perk:One Handed(Dual),LightArmor
 Inventory:ElvenArmor set
 Location:Windhelm Palace of the Kings

Julie
 BodyType:UNPB
 Skill & Perk:Archery,Sneak
 Inventory:ElvenArmor set
 Location:Falkreath DeadMan\'s Drink

Hellena
 BodyType:CHSBHC
 Skill & Perk:Two Handed,HeavyArmor
 Inventory:DeadricArmor set
 Location:Winterhold The Frozen Hearth 

Lucienne
 BodyType:UNPB
 Skill & Perk:Destruction(spark)
 Inventory:ArchMage\'s Robe
 Location:Whiterun Dragonsreach

(v1.2)
Claudia
BodyType:CHSBHC
Skill&Perk:Onehanded,HeavyArmor,Dragon Shouts
Shouts:Unrelenting Force,Disarm
Inventory:DwarvenArmorset
Location:Whiterun Dragonsreach 2F

Sieglinde
BodyType:CHSBHC
Skill&Perk:Onehanded,LightArmor,Destruction
Inventory:SaviorsHide
Location:Solitude WinkingSkeever 2F

(1.3)
Eva
BodyType:CHSBHC
Skill&Perk:Destruction(Fire)
Inventory:Warlock Robe
Location:Whiterun Dragonsreach

Iris
BodyType:UNPB
Skill&Perk:Lockpicking,sneak
Inventory:FurArmor,Daggar
Location:Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn
Iris has not combatskill. but she has tresurehunt skills.

Marico
BodyType:CBBE(made with BodySlider)
Skill&Perk:Twohanded,HeavyArmor,Dragonshout(Ice Form),DragonBreath
Inventory:LeatherArmor,Skyforge Twohanded Sword
Location:Whiterun Jorrvaskr

Marico using DragonBreath.
I was mistaken to set the Fire Breath of Dragon shout.
but it is so funny that human use Dragon breath.
I leave it so :)
Description in Japanese for v1.3(more image but There are some adult images.)
http://skyrimghost.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-248.html

(1.4)
Lily
BodyType:CHSBHC
Skill&Perk:Archery,LightArmor
Inventory:Nightingale
Location:Whiterun Dragonsreach

Ljudmila
BodyType:CBBE
Skill&Perk:Destruction(Ice)
Inventory:Robe of Destruction
Location:Whiterun Arcadia\'s Cauldron


CHSBHC Bodytype using CBBEv3 textures.
There is something wrong with the graphics in the wrist but can use the CBBEv3 equipment MOD.

Description in Japanese
http://skyrimghost.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-236.html
